Title: Louvre Museum
Description: World's largest art museum and historic monument.

Title: Great Wall of China
Description: A series of fortifications in northern China, spanning approximately 13,171 miles.

Title: Machu Picchu
Description: An ancient Inca citadel located in the Andes Mountains of Peru.

Title: Taj Mahal
Description: A white marble mausoleum located in Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India.

Title: Christ the Redeemer
Description: An Art Deco statue of Jesus Christ in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

Title: Eiffel Tower
Description: A wrought-iron lattice tower located on the Champ de Mars in Paris.
Address: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France

Title: Notre-Dame Cathedral
Description: A medieval Catholic cathedral located on the Île de la Cité in Paris.

Title: Palace of Versailles
Description: A grand royal palace located in the city of Versailles, near Paris.

Title: Montmartre
Description: A historic neighborhood known for its bohemian atmosphere and Sacré-Cœur Basilica.

Title: Sugarloaf Mountain
Description: A peak situated in Rio de Janeiro, known for its panoramic views of the city.

Title: Copacabana Beach
Description: One of the most famous beaches in the world, located in the neighborhood of Copacabana.

Title: Ipanema Beach
Description: A popular beach located in the neighborhood of Ipanema, known for its vibrant atmosphere.

Title: Tijuca National Park
Description: A tropical rainforest and national park, offering hiking trails and stunning waterfalls.
Address: Estrada da Cascatinha, 850 - Alto da Boa Vista

Title: Maracanã Stadium
Description: One of the most iconic football stadiums in the world, home to many historic matches.
Address: Av. Pres. Castelo Branco, Portão 3 - Maracanã

Title: Jardim Botânico
Description: A botanical garden featuring a wide variety of plants, trees, and beautiful pathways.
